scripts.dev: echo 'Starting backend server on port 3001...' && node -e 'const http = require("http"); const server = http.createServer((req, res) => { res.writeHead(200, {"Content-Type": "application/json", "Access-Control-Allow-Origin": "*", "Access-Control-Allow-Headers": "Content-Type"}); if(req.method === "OPTIONS") { res.end(); return; } res.end(JSON.stringify({status: "TCO Calculator API Demo", version: "1.0.0", endpoints: ["GET /health", "POST /calculate"]})); }); server.listen(3001, () => console.log("ğŸš€ Backend demo server running on http://localhost:3001"));'
